outro.name: Outro Skill: Stand by Me, Warrior

Feral Fang Marked.desc: The DMG Multiplier for {Feral Fang} to marked targets is increased by 50%.

Pack Hunt.desc: Resonators with {Pack Hunt} gain a 6% ATK increase, and 10% Fusion DMG Bonus when they attack Overlord Class or Calamity Class targets (both are non-stackable).

Pack Hunt Fusion Team.desc: Resonators with {Pack Hunt}: If there are 3 Fusion Resonators in the team, the Fusion DMG Bonus against Overlord Class or Calamity Class targets additionally increases by 10%.

Pack Hunt Three Fusion Team.desc: When the active Resonator casts Intro Skill, {Pack Hunt} is enhanced, granting an additional 6% ATK increase to all Resonators in the team, up to a maximum of 18%.

Wildfire Banner.desc: Lupa's ATK is increased by 12% for 8s when casting Resonance Skill {Feral Fang}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Gnawing}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Claw}, Mid-air Attack {Firestrike}, Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory}, or {Dance With the Wolf}/{Dance With the Wolf - Climax}.

Inherent Skill: Applause of Victory.desc: Defeating a marked target resets the cooldown of Resonance Skill {Shewolf's Hunt}. Casting Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory} grants {Glory}. Within 35s, attacks of all Resonators in the team ignore 3% of the target's Fusion RES. For each Fusion Resonator in the team other than Lupa, this effect increases by 3%, up to the maximum of 9%.

Inherent Skill: Applause of Victory: Fus.desc: When there are 3 Fusion Resonators in the team, Resonators' attacks further ignore 6% Fusion RES.

Sequence Node 1: Behold the Nameless One.desc: Performing Resonance Skill {Fire-Kissed Glory} recovers 10 Concerto Energy for Lupa and increases Lupa's Crit. Rate by 20% for 10s. {Dance With the Wolf - Climax} is immune to interruption.

Sequence Node 2: Every Ground, Her Hunti.desc: Performing {Fire-Kissed Glory}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Gnawing}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Claw}, or Mid-air Attack {Firestrike} gives 20% Fusion DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30s, stacking up to 2 times.

Sequence Node 3: Wolflame Howls in Her W.desc: The DMG Multiplier of Intro Skill {Nowhere to Run!} increases by 100%. The effect of Resonance Liberation {Glory} is now updated as follows: Casting Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory} grants {Glory}. Attacks of all Resonators in the team ignore 15% Fusion RES for 35s.

Sequence Node 4: High and Aflame Is Her.desc: The DMG Multiplier of {Dance With the Wolf - Climax} increases by 125%.

Sequence Node 5: Embrace the Thunderous.desc: Performing Intro Skill {Try Focusing, Eh?} or {Nowhere to Run!} gives 15% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 10s.

Sequence Node 6: To the Brightest Flamin.desc: The damage dealt by Forte Circuit {Dance With the Wolf - Climax}, Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory}, and Intro Skill {Nowhere to Run!} ignores 30% of the target's DEF. Resonance Skill {Feral Fang} restores 100 points of Wolflame on hit, triggered once per 20s. Forte Circuit {Dance With the Wolf} is replaced with {Dance With the Wolf - Climax}. {Dance With the Wolf - Climax} can be performed when Lupa is not in Burning Matchpoint state. Casting Intro Skill {Nowhere to Run!} no longer ends {Pack Hunt} and {Glory}.

teamBuff.name: Pack Hunt
teamBuff.desc: Resonators with {Pack Hunt} gain a 6% ATK increase, and 10% Fusion DMG Bonus when they attack Overlord Class or Calamity Class targets (both are non-stackable).

teamBuff.name: Pack Hunt Fusion Team
teamBuff.desc: Resonators with {Pack Hunt}: If there are 3 Fusion Resonators in the team, the Fusion DMG Bonus against Overlord Class or Calamity Class targets additionally increases by 10%.

teamBuff.name: Pack Hunt Enhanced
teamBuff.desc: When the active Resonator casts Intro Skill, {Pack Hunt} is enhanced, granting an additional 6% ATK increase to all Resonators in the team, up to a maximum of 18%.

teamBuff.name: Inherent Skill: Applause of Victory
teamBuff.desc: Casting Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory} grants {Glory}. Within 35s, attacks of all Resonators in the team ignore 3% of the target's Fusion RES. For each Fusion Resonator in the team other than Lupa, this effect increases by 3%, up to the maximum of 9%.

teamBuff.name: Inherent Skill: Applause of Victory: Fusion Team
teamBuff.desc: When there are 3 Fusion Resonators in the team, Resonators' attacks further ignore 6% Fusion RES.

teamBuff.name: Outro Skill: Stand by Me, Warrior
teamBuff.desc: The incoming Resonator will have their Fusion DMG Amplified by 20% and Basic Attack DMG Amplified by 25% for 14s or until the Resonator is switched out.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 2: Every Ground, Her Hunting Field
teamBuff.desc: Performing {Fire-Kissed Glory}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Gnawing}, Heavy Attack {Wolf's Claw}, or Mid-air Attack {Firestrike} gives 20% Fusion DMG Bonus to all Resonators in the team for 30s, stacking up to 2 times.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 3: Wolflame Howls in Her Wake
teamBuff.desc: Casting Resonance Liberation {Fire-Kissed Glory} grants {Glory}. Attacks of all Resonators in the team ignore 15% Fusion RES for 35s.
